channel.title: Pokemon
channel.description:
Although I don't know a lot about Pokemon, I did player Pokemon Diamond a lot with my best friend, which was several years ago. I'll eventually finish playing all of the other versions too (both the older and newer ones).
I've been using an emulator to play some of the versions (although I played Diamond on the DS), so I was wondering if anyone has a favorite emulator (GBA/DS/BOTH), and why you enjoy it. The only problem with the current emulator I use is that it doesn't allow me to re-size my DS games. Also, what is your favorite Pokemon game, and why?

item.title: Pokemon
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

<3 GBA and GBC

CoolROM.com

CoolROM.com - N64 ROMs GBA ROMs SNES ROMs NDS ROMs GBC ROMs NES ROMs MAME ROMs...

Download from the largest and cleanest ROMs and emulators resource on the net. Mobile optimized. Systems include N64, GBA, SNES, NDS, GBC, NES, MAME, PSX, Gamecube and more.

That’s where I get all my emulators and rom files from.

runewings317:

Visual Boy Advance is probably your best bet for GBA emulator. I’ve been using it for a couple years now and I love it.

visual boy advance is excellent for me.
